mapper.insert: insert into SM_DICTIONARY_TB (FIELD_NAME, CODE, CONTENT, PARENT_FIELD_NAME, PARENT_FIELD_CODE) values (#{fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentFieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentFieldCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into SM_DICTIONARY_TB
FIELD_NAME,
CODE,
CONTENT,
PARENT_FIELD_NAME,
PARENT_FIELD_CODE,
#{fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{parentFieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{parentFieldCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: select code as "id", '0' as "pid", content as "name" from sm_dictionary_tb where field_name = 'BUSI_RANGE'
